summary: Comprehensive frontend testing completed for SOCLIX clone app. All requested features working correctly: modal appears on Streams page after URL entry and scan button click, language switcher works with localStorage persistence, translations display correctly across all pages.

modal_functionality.details: Modal appears correctly after entering stream URL and clicking 'Сканировать' button. Modal contains all required fields: stream URL display, product codes, colors, sizes, keywords. Processing flow works with success state and auto-close.

language_switcher.details: Language selector in navbar works correctly. Can change between EN, RU, PL, LV, UK, BE languages.

language_persistence_navigation.details: Language persists when navigating between pages (Homepage -> Pricing -> Streams -> Contact)

language_persistence_reload.details: Language persists after page reload via localStorage (i18nextLng key)

homepage_translations.details: Homepage displays correctly in both EN and RU with proper translations for hero section, features, and navigation

pricing_page_translations.details: Pricing page displays correctly with translated pricing tiers (Стартовый, Про, Корпоративный) and FAQ section

streams_page_table.details: Streams page table displays 13 mock data rows with profiles, comments, product codes, colors, sizes, dates, and quantities. Footer shows correct stats.

contact_page.details: Contact page displays correctly with form fields and contact information in both EN and RU

dark_mode.details: Dark mode toggle works correctly with proper contrast and styling

critical_code_review_comments: Modal textarea fields may cause DOM detachment issues when filling multiple fields rapidly - consider using controlled inputs with debounce
All data is MOCKED - no backend integration yet for stream processing, user authentication, or profile data
test_credentials: No credentials needed - frontend uses mock data
seed_data_creation: None - using existing mock data from streamOrdersData.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend features tested and working. Modal on Streams page opens correctly after URL entry. Language persistence via localStorage working. Mock data displays correctly in table. Backend integration is MOCKED - will need testing when real APIs are implemented.
